entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
